INSERT into t_order
member_id=#{memberId},

mapper.select: select m.name member ,s.name setmeal,o.orderDate orderDate,o.orderType orderType from t_order o, t_member m, t_setmeal s where o.member_id=m.id and o.setmeal_id=s.id and o.id=#{id}
SELECT s.name, COUNT(o.id) setmeal_count, COUNT(o.id)/(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_order) proportion FROM t_order o,t_setmeal s WHERE o.setmeal_id = s.id GROUP BY s.name ORDER BY COUNT(o.id) DESC LIMIT 2
